metadata.Name: Belgian Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset (BSARD)
metadata.Description: A collection of French native legal questions posed by Belgian citizens and law articles from the Belgian legislation. Each question is labeled by one or several relevant articles from the corpus.
metadata.Paper Title: A Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset in French
metadata.Abstract: Statutory article retrieval is the task of automatically retrieving law articles relevant to a legal question. To address the scarcity of large-scale and high-quality annotated datasets, we introduce the Belgian Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset (BSARD), which consists of 1,100+ French native legal questions labeled by experienced jurists with relevant articles from a corpus of 22,600+ Belgian law articles.
